text: Calliotropis solomonensis is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Eucyclidae. ==Description== The shell grows to a height of 4.5 mm. ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Pacific Ocean off the Solomon Islands. ==References== * Vilvens C. (2007) New records and new species of Calliotropis from Indo-Pacific. Novapex 8 (Hors Série 5): 1–72 ==External links== * solomonensis Category:Gastropods described in 2007
title: Calliotropis solomonensis
